metadata.feature_description: View and manage assigned workflow tasks for content review and approval

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access My Work from Module Actions Menu

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and enabled Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode enabled with module action menus visible
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled successfully with module action menus visible

steps.action: Opened Admin menu for Text/HTML module (468)
steps.expected: Module actions menu should display 'My Work' option as documented
steps.actual: Module actions menu shows: Settings, Export Content, Import Content, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh - NO 'My Work' option found

issues: The 'My Work' option documented as accessible via Module Actions > My Work is not present in the HTML module's action menu. The feature appears to have been removed or deprecated in the current version.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Direct URL Access to My Work Control

steps.action: Changed page workflow from Direct Publish to Content Approval
steps.actual: Workflow setting saved with success message 'Page updated successfully'

steps.expected: My Work page should display with list of pending workflow tasks
steps.actual: Page loads but displays empty content - no task list visible, no UI elements for workflow task management

issues: The MyWork control URL pattern (/Home/ctl/MyWork/moduleid/[id]) results in an empty page with no visible workflow task interface. The control file MyWork.ascx may be missing or not rendering.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Alternative Workflow Task Management via Content Library

steps.expected: Content Library page loads with filtering options
steps.actual: Content Library page loads with Sort By, Content Type, Status, and date range filters

steps.expected: Status filter shows workflow status options
steps.actual: Status filter displays: All Content, Saved as Draft, Published - providing workflow status filtering capability
Workflow management page loads showing available workflows: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval

observations: The 'My Work' feature documented in the HTML Pro module documentation (Managing My Workflow Tasks.html) is not accessible via the documented path (Module Actions > My Work).
The module configuration file (dnn_HtmlPro.dnn) defines a MyWork control at controlKey='MyWork' with controlSrc='DesktopModules/HTML/MyWork.ascx', but the control does not render in the UI.
Direct URL access to /Home/ctl/MyWork/moduleid/[id] results in an empty page with no workflow task interface.
The MyWork.ascx file was not found in the codebase during code review, suggesting the feature may have been deprecated or moved.

Modern workflow task management appears to have been consolidated into the Content Library with Status filtering (All Content, Saved as Draft, Published) and the centralized Workflow management in Settings > Workflow.

The code in HtmlTextController.cs references workflow migration from HTML workflows to Content Workflows (MigrateHTMLWorkflowsToContentWorkflows method), indicating architectural changes that may have deprecated the legacy My Work feature.
